snippet.title: RollerGirl Trailer 1.1
snippet.description:
RollerGirl is an Adventure Narrative game set in 2010. 
Play as Noami, a 16-year-old girl who loves to rollerblade around with her MP3 player.
The music on her MP3 player changes how the world around her looks, feels and behaves. 
Talk to neighbours and find interesting secrets throughout the town. 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Join our newsletter for monthly updates on the development: https://bit.ly/RGMailList

Check out our current demo free on Itch: https://bit.ly/RGDemo

Check out our devlog here: https://bit.ly/RG_DL

Join us on Discord: https://bit.ly/39hwIuu
